data.text: @Reuters Terrorists, the whole lot. Useful to Russian efforts.
@Reuters Did they miss that WWIII is about to start or are they getting ready to be abducted by aliens per Independence Day.

@scott_klinn @Reuters Wearing a mask in a super confined environment where the air is circulated constantly makes more sense than wearing pants but no one is protesting having to cover their genitals, just their mouth. It's REALLY dumb and I guarantee not a single trucker has flown on a plane in a bit

@scott_klinn @Reuters Yeah, and I'm required to wear pants.  Wearing pants when the environment doesn't call for it is IRRATIONAL AND ILLOGICAL.  You and the rest of the world only does it because your parents and 2000 years of parents before them told their kids to.  It started with Christianity.
@SteveLuttner @Reuters Restrictions on their ability to think clearly.
@Steveycz @Reuters Hawaii. They should drive to Hawaii. LOL
